classes.name: DashboardClient
classes.description: The client for handling everything. See {@tutorial GettingStarted} for more information how to get started using this class.

params.name: config
params.description: The config to pass to the new client

props.name: server
props.description: The http server handler for the api

props.name: routes
props.description: The cache where routes are stored

props.name: middlewares
props.description: The cache where middlewares are stored

props.name: dashboardUsers
props.description: The cache where oauth data is temporarily stored

props.name: client
props.description: The Client that manages this Server instance

props.name: server
props.description: The http.Server instance that manages the HTTP requests

props.name: onNoMatch
props.description: The onError function called when a url does not match

methods.name: listen
methods.description: Starts the server listening to a port

params.name: port
params.description: The port to run the server on

methods.name: handler
methods.description: The handler for incoming requests

methods.name: onError
methods.description: The handler for errors

params.name: user
params.description: The OAuth User this Guild is for

props.name: client
props.description: The DashboardClient

props.name: user
props.description: The OAuth User this DashboardGuild is for

props.name: id
props.description: The guild id

props.name: name
props.description: The guild name

props.name: icon
props.description: The guild icon hash

props.name: userIsOwner
props.description: If the logged in OAuthUser is the owner of the guild

props.name: userGuildPermissions
props.description: The guild permissions for the logged in OAuthUser

props.name: userCanManage
props.description: If the logged in OAuthUser can manage the guild (invite bots)

props.name: iconURL
props.description: The url for the guild's icon

props.name: guild
props.description: The guild for this DashboardGuild

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: The toJSON behavior of this structure

props.name: client
props.description: The DashboardClient

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the OAuth User

props.name: username
props.description: The username of the OAuth User

props.name: discriminator
props.description: The discriminator of the OAuth User

props.name: locale
props.description: The language of the OAuth User

props.name: mfaEnabled
props.description: If the OAuth User has multi-factor Authentication enabled

props.name: avatar
props.description: The OAuth User's avatar hash

props.name: guilds
props.description: The collection of OAuth Guilds this OAuth User is in

props.name: avatarURL
props.description: The Avatar URL for this OAuth User

props.name: user
props.description: The User for this OAuth User

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: The toJSON behavior of this Object

methods.name: setupGuilds
methods.description: Setups all DashboardGuilds for the passed in Dashboard User

params.name: dashboardUser
params.description: The dashboard user guilds are being setup for

params.name: guilds
params.description: The raw guild data to setup

classes.name: Middleware
classes.description:
Base class for all Klasa Middleware. See {@tutorial CreatingMiddlewares} for more information how to use this class
to build custom events.

params.name: file
params.description: The path from the pieces folder to the middleware file

params.name: core
params.description: If the piece is in the core directory or not

props.name: priority
props.description: The priority in which this middleware should run

methods.name: run
methods.description: The run method to be overwritten in actual event handlers

classes.name: MiddlewareStore
classes.description: Stores all the middlewares that are part of Klasa-dashboard-hooks

props.name: sortedMiddlwares
props.description: The middlewares sorted by priority

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the RouteStore

methods.name: set
methods.description: Adds a Middleware to this MiddlewareStore

params.name: piece
params.description: The Middleware to add to this store

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Middleware from this MiddlewareStore

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the Middleware or the Middleware

methods.name: run
methods.description: Runs all the middleware.

classes.name: Route
classes.description:
Base class for all Klasa Routes. See {@tutorial CreatingRoutes} for more information how to use this class
to build custom events.

params.name: file
params.description: The path from the pieces folder to the route file

params.name: core
params.description: If the piece is in the core directory or not

props.name: route
props.description: Stored bound run method, so it can be properly disabled and reloaded later

props.name: authenticated
props.description: If the route is authenticated

props.name: parsed
props.description: Stored parsed route

methods.name: matches
methods.description: If this route matches a provided url

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Extracts the params from a provided url

classes.name: RouteStore
classes.description: Stores all the routes that are part of Klasa-dashboard-hooks

props.name: registry
props.description: A lookup registry of Maps keyed on http method

methods.name: findRoute
methods.description: Finds a route using the registry

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the RouteStore

methods.name: set
methods.description: Adds a Route to this RouteStore

params.name: piece
params.description: The route to add to this store

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Route from this RouteStore

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the Route or the Route

classes.name: Util
classes.description:
Utility function class
<danger>This class cannot be initialized with new</danger>

methods.name: parsePart
methods.description: Parses a url part

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a url into it's parts

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Splits and parses a url into it's parts

params.name: url
params.description: The url to split and parse

methods.name: encrypt
methods.description: Encrypts an object with aes-256-cbc to use as a token

params.name: secret
params.description: The secret to encrypt the data with

methods.name: decrypt
methods.description: Decrypts an object with aes-256-cbc to use as a token

params.name: secret
params.description: The secret to decrypt the data with

props.name: dashboardHooks
props.description: The Klasa-Dashboard-Hooks specific options

props.name: apiPrefix
props.description: The route prefix for the api

props.name: origin
props.description: The cross origin setting

props.name: port
props.description: The port the api runs on

props.name: http2
props.description: Whether the server should use http/2 or not

props.name: sslOptions
props.description: The SSL options

props.name: token
props.description: The access token

props.name: scope
props.description: The scopes

props.name: originalUrl
props.description: The original URL

props.name: path
props.description: The entire path section of the URL, including the `host`, `port`... and before the `query`/`hash` components

props.name: search
props.description: The entire query string portion of the URL including the leading ASCII question mark (`?`) character

props.name: query
props.description: The collection of key and value pairs parsed from the query string portion

props.name: body
props.description: The body parsed in POST requests

props.name: auth
props.description: The auth access token and scopes

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the DashboardGuild

props.name: name
props.description: The name of this DashboardGuild

props.name: icon
props.description: The icon hash

props.name: userIsOwner
props.description: If the user this is meant for is Owner of the guild

props.name: userGuildPermissions
props.description: The permissions bitfield for the OAuth User in the Guild

props.name: userCanManage
props.description: If the user can manage this DashboardGuild

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the DashboardUser

props.name: username
props.description: The name of this DashboardUser

props.name: avatar
props.description: The avatar hash

props.name: discriminator
props.description: The discriminator of this DashboardUser

props.name: locale
props.description: The language of this DashboardUser

props.name: mfaEnabled
props.description: If the OAuth User has multi-factor Authentication enabled

props.name: guilds
props.description: The guilds associated with this OAuth User

props.name: val
props.description: The value of the url part

props.name: type
props.description: The type of url part (0 for static, 1 for variable)
